include/ulib/net/rpc/rpc.h

00001 // ============================================================================
00002 //
00003 // = LIBRARY
00004 //    ulib - c++ library
00005 //
00006 // = FILENAME
00007 //    rpc.h - RPC utility
00008 //
00009 // = AUTHOR
00010 //    Stefano Casazza
00011 //
00012 // ============================================================================
00013 
00014 #ifndef ULIB_RPC_H
00015 #define ULIB_RPC_H 1
00016 
00017 #include <ulib/utility/socket_ext.h>
00018 #include <ulib/utility/string_ext.h>
00019 
00020 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00021 // Very simple RPC-like layer
00022 //
00023 // Requests and responses are build of little packets each containing a U_TOKEN_NM-byte ascii token,
00024 // an 8-byte hex value or length, and optionally data corresponding to the length.
00025 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00026 
00027 class U_EXPORT URPC {
00028 public:
00029 
00030         // RPC representation
00031 
00032         static UVector<UString>* rpc_info;
00033 
00034         static void allocate()
00035                 {
00036                 U_TRACE(0, "URPC::allocate()")
00037 
00038                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_EQUALS(rpc_info,0)
00039 
00040                 rpc_info = U_NEW(UVector<UString>);
00041                 }
00042 
00043         static void resetRPCInfo()
00044                 {
00045                 U_TRACE(0, "URPC::resetRPCInfo()")
00046 
00047                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(rpc_info)
00048 
00049                 rpc_info->clear();
00050                 }
00051 
00052         static bool readRPC(USocket* socket, UString& rbuffer)
00053                 {
00054                 U_TRACE(0, "URPC::readRPC(%p,%p)", socket, &rbuffer)
00055 
00056                 bool is_rpc_msg = readTokenVector(socket, 0, rbuffer, *rpc_info);
00057 
00058                 U_RETURN(is_rpc_msg);
00059                 }
00060 
00061         // Transmit token name (U_TOKEN_NM characters) and value (32-bit int, as 8 hex characters)
00062 
00063         static bool sendTokenInt(USocket* s, const char* token, uint32_t value, UString& buffer)
00064                 {
00065                 U_TRACE(0, "URPC::sendTokenInt(%p,%S,%u,%.*S)", s, token, value, U_STRING_TO_TRACE(buffer))
00066 
00067                 UStringExt::buildTokenInt(token, value, buffer);
00068 
00069                 bool result = USocketExt::write(s, buffer);
00070 
00071                 U_RETURN(result);
00072                 }
00073 
00074         // Write a token, and then the string data
00075 
00076         static bool sendTokenString(USocket* s, const char* token, const UString& data, UString& buffer)
00077                 {
00078                 U_TRACE(0, "URPC::sendTokenString(%p,%S,%.*S,%.*S)", s, token, U_STRING_TO_TRACE(data), U_STRING_TO_TRACE(buffer))
00079 
00080                 UStringExt::buildTokenString(token, data, buffer);
00081 
00082                 bool result = USocketExt::write(s, buffer);
00083 
00084                 U_RETURN(result);
00085                 }
00086 
00087         // Transmit an vector of string
00088 
00089         static bool sendTokenVector(USocket* s, const char* token, UVector<UString>& vec, UString& buffer)
00090                 {
00091                 U_TRACE(0, "URPC::sendTokenVector(%p,%S,%p,%.*S)", s, token, &vec, U_STRING_TO_TRACE(buffer))
00092 
00093                 UStringExt::buildTokenVector(token, vec, buffer);
00094 
00095                 bool result = USocketExt::write(s, buffer);
00096 
00097                 U_RETURN(result);
00098                 }
00099 
00100         // Read a token and value
00101 
00102         static uint32_t readTokenInt(USocket* s, const char* token, UString& buffer);
00103 
00104         // Read a token, and then the string data
00105 
00106         static uint32_t readTokenString(USocket* s, const char* token, UString& buffer, UString& data);
00107 
00108         // Read an vector of string from the network
00109 
00110         static bool readTokenVector(USocket* s, const char* token, UString& buffer, UVector<UString>& vec);
00111         // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00112 
00113 private:
00114         URPC(const URPC&)            {}
00115         URPC& operator=(const URPC&) { return *this; }
00116 };
00117 
00118 #endif
